newsitem.title: GREECE: Athens bourse OKs Athens Medical Clinic of P.F IPO.
newsitem.headline: Athens bourse OKs Athens Medical Clinic of P.F IPO.

text.p: The Athens bourse approved the IPO prospectus of the Athens Medical Clinic of Paleon Faliron, it said in a statement.
The firm will issue 317,000 common registered shares and the IPO price will be determined before public subscriptions, it said.

The IPO proceeds will be used to fund its participation in the share capital increase of the Inter-Balkan Medical Centre firm, new investments in the medical sector, new buildings and the purchase of high-tech medical equipment, it said.
Athens Medical Clinic of Paleon Faliron is a subsidiary of Athens Medical Centre. --Dimitris Kontogiannis, Athens Newsroom +301 3311812-4
